segments.text: What courses did you major in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I took more than 10 subjects including Theoretical Economics , Political Economics , Western Economics , Statistics and so on . In addition to the courses of my major , I took minor courses too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What courses did you minor in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I took computer science and English courses as my minor subjects .
segments.speaker: S2
